title: What is the value of a BSc degree from COMSATS in the future? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am comsian graduated in 2009 currently working in Google where I am part of networking team that manages Google's global network. My batch fellows are all around the world working in different fortune 500 companies including IBM, Intel, Huawei, Ericson etc. I must say CIIT is a great institute that will give you right platform to launch but eventually your success or failure will boil down to the effort and hardwork which you will put in crafting your career and of course you have to be lucky aswel … so cut the long story short it is not comsats that will bring value to your BS degree in fact it is you

COMSATS is getting recognition world-wide. you can look at her students spread almost all over the world, doing research and jobs. the time had gone when Pakistani post graduate students were only known from UET Lahore. their strength can be seen from Dual Degree Scandle (case). they are getting recognition in research, faculty development, teaching quality and much more. Its degree do have value and I’m looking its very bright future. also, COMSATS is top ranked Paki university. for details follow link COMSATS Institute of Information Technology
